text: :for Hugbert, Duke of Bavaria, see Hugbert of Bavaria Hugbert of Meissen (also noted as Hubert, Hukbrecht, Hucbert, Humbert, Umbert, Huprecht, Humprecht, Wipert, Wiprecht, and Rupert; died on or about 27 March 1024 or on 5 April 1024Sächsische Biografie) was Bishop of Meissen from 1023 to 1024. Eduard Machatschek: Geschichte der Bischöfe des Hochstiftes Meissen in chronologischer Reihenfolge &c; (pp. 38-43). Dresden 1884 There is no information on his previous life or career. He was consecrated by Humfrid, Archbishop of Magdeburg. He was buried in Meissen Cathedral, but the exact position of his burial is now unknown. == References == Category:Bishops of Meissen Category:Year of birth unknown Category:1024 deaths
title: Hugbert of Meissen
